A technique known by [[Kirigakure]] [[hunter-nin]]. The user makes rain that absorbs any [[chakra]] it comes into contact with, as long as it's not of the same signature as the original user. The effect of this technique is powerful enough to absorb [[Utakata]]'s [[Soap Bubble Ninjutsu]] and [[Naruto]]'s [[Rasengan]].

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|"Kirisame"|霧雨}} can be translated as "misty rain'" or "thin rain as mist". "Kiri" means "fog" or "mist". "Same" or "Ame" originally means "rain".
